SELECT t_sku_product.* FROM t_sku_product
left join t_sku_tag_relation on t_sku_tag_relation.sku_id = t_sku_product.id left join t_sku_tag on t_sku_tag_relation.tag_id = t_sku_tag.id left join t_sku_specification on t_sku_specification.sku_id = t_sku_product.id left join t_specification_group on t_sku_specification.group_id = t_specification_group.id left join t_product on t_product.id = t_sku_product.product_id left join t_product_category on t_product_category.id = t_product.product_category_id left join wms_inventory on wms_inventory.sku_id = t_sku_product.id left join wms_warehouse on wms_warehouse.id = wms_inventory.warehouse_id
WHERE 1=1
AND ( t_sku_product.sku_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') or t_sku_product.sku_code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') or t_sku_product.bar_code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') )
AND t_sku_tag.tag_name = #{tagName}
AND t_specification_group.group_name = #{specName}
AND t_product_category.category_name = #{categoryName}
AND wms_warehouse.warehouse_name = #{warehouseName}
AND wms_warehouse.id = #{warehouseId}
AND t_sku_product.id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.id},'%')
AND t_sku_product.product_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.productId},'%')
AND t_sku_product.sku_code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.skuCode},'%')
AND t_sku_product.sku_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.skuName},'%')
AND t_sku_product.status LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.status},'%')
AND t_sku_product.sort_value LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.sortValue},'%')
AND t_sku_product.search_key_word LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.searchKeyWord},'%')
AND t_sku_product.bar_code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.barCode},'%')
AND t_sku_product.description LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.description},'%')
AND t_sku_product.sku_price LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.skuPrice},'%')
AND t_sku_product.readjust_cost_price LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.readjustCostPrice},'%')
AND t_sku_product.suggested_price LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.suggestedPrice},'%')
AND t_sku_product.cost_price LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.costPrice},'%')
AND t_sku_product.stock_cost LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.stockCost},'%')
AND t_sku_product.create_time LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.createTime},'%')
AND t_sku_product.update_time LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.updateTime},'%')
AND t_sku_product.field1 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.field1},'%')
AND t_sku_product.field2 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.field2},'%')
AND t_sku_product.field3 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.field3},'%')
group by t_sku_product.id order by t_sku_product.sku_code ASC
